article_metadata.author: Neil Assur

og.description: If the GOP primary is any indication, the 2016 presidential election will be an especially exciting race. For starters, this year's Republican field is especially deep: with this week's entry of John Kasich, there are now 16 legitimate contenders for the GOP Presidential nomination--easily surpassing that of any primary in recent [...]
og.title: State Of The Debate: GOP Top Ten, July 23rd 2015
